aka: On the Day the School Bus Left
this_title: Sa Adlaw Na Nabiyaan Mi Sa School Bus
trans_title: On the Day the School Bus Left
introduction: A hideous crime beside a Catholic school in Carcar City, Cebu—the girly and mischievous Oona and the silent and plain Tris, both raised by their single mothers, conspire to hide this on an afternoon when the school bus had forgotten about them.
chinese_title: Sa Adlaw Na Nabiyaan Mi Sa School Bus
